ygData.subject: Re: Subject: Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: heheehe Its fun when people tell you, Hey vashi, there is a polar bear gnawing on your head, want me to chop it off? Yeah I kninda rew tired of the bear and
ygData.messageBody:
heheehe

Its fun when people tell you, Hey vashi, there is a polar bear gnawing on
your head, want me to chop it off?

Yeah I kninda rew tired of the bear and wanted something else...
But the first plate pice I get has to be the helmet cus banded makes me look
like a dork, an Im a tough guy heheeheheheh

Vashi

>From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
>Well put great warrior. This is the best and only reason to be the single
>best tank in Norrath! But I don't want full plate mail. I intend to keep
>my leather bear hat 'cause it looks so much better than a plate helm. Wish
>everquest would make a plate mail bear hat :o)
>
>>Correct me if Im wrong, and I usually am.
>>But what I hear is that warriors get lots more hp,s at higher levs, past
>>20
>>I belive,
>>
>>And can rangers wear all types of armor? have same stamina?Might be true
>>that ragers kick warrior but at this level.
>>What interests me though is what it is like at higher levels.
>>
>>I play a warrior cus I want to be the fat ass barbarian standing in full
>>plate in the front line suckin it all up.
>>I want to feel the steel slice through my arms and get beaten to a bloody
>>pulp, I want to be the guys that keeps the mobs from walkin all over the
>>party, I want to be the one that dies first but did a damn good job trying
>>to protect his friends.
>>
>>If this is possible with a ranger in the same extent as with a warrior,
>>then I might change.
>>
>>Vashi, Eternal warriors
>
>For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
>
>Patty of Halas
>username: Patricia
>server: Bristlebane
